quotes.qoute: Holding onto anger is like driking poison and expecting the other person to die - Buddha
Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship - Buddha
Happiness does not depend on what you have or who you are. It solely relies on what you think - Buddha
quotes.quote: स्वतःचे जीवन धर्माप्रमाणे जगतो तो पुरुषोत्तम होय
किमान एकतरी व्यक्ती निर्व्यसनी बनविण्याचे व्रत समाजात आमूलाग्र बदल घडवू शकते
